scripts.build: npm run clean && npm i && npm run generate_css && npm run copy_fonts && npm run optimize_images && npm run minimize_source
scripts.copy_fonts: mkdir -p distribution && cp -Ri node_modules/font-awesome/fonts distribution/fonts && cp -Ri fonts/* distribution/fonts
scripts.minimize_source: usemin contact.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/contact.html && usemin community.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/community.html && usemin index.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/index.html
